name: Qst Godot 3D Test
description:
Started learning Godot 3!

This is just a basic 3D game and sloppy html5 build I speed ran (~2 hours) over lunch.

Arrows to move, spacebar to jump and Enter/Return to reset.

Try to get the ball under the purple goal post and see the "You Win!" screen. 🏁

I used the tutorials by Jeremy Bullock

If anyone has advice for getting started, best resources or anything about using Godot you think I might fancy, please link it ! 😁

Here is a link to the Godot Engine Homepage!
